parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure and Oil Consumption Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded. The excessive oil consumption can also lead to engine failure, which can cause safety risks.
symptoms: The engine stalls or loses power
loud knocking or rattling sounds
oil consumption issues
check engine light comes on
engine overheating
and metal shavings found in the oil.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lack of Warning Signs or Lights
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The absence of warning signs or lights can lead to sudden engine failure, causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: No warning lights or signs on the dashboard
no indication of engine problems before failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Hyundai's Response to Engine Failure Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Hyundai's response to engine failure issues can lead to frustration and financial burden for customers.
symptoms: Hyundai denies warranty claims
refuses to replace engines
or offers expensive repairs.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure and Oil Consumption Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded. The oil consumption issues can also lead to engine failure, which can cause a loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: The engine stalls or loses power
the vehicle makes a loud knocking or clunking noise
the oil light comes on
the vehicle consumes excessive amounts of oil
the engine seizes
and the vehicle may catch fire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch and hydraulic system can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine stalls or loses power while driving
often without warning; the vehicle may hesitate or decelerate abruptly; the engine may catch fire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle loses all electrical power; the battery runs down quickly; the vehicle may catch fire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents.
symptoms: The brakes fail to function properly; the vehicle accelerates unexpectedly; the vehicle loses power steering and proper braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the manufacturer to address safety recalls can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle is subject to safety recalls
but the manufacturer fails to provide a remedy or notify the owner.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment system can cause distractions while driving, leading to accidents.
symptoms: The navigation screen does not turn off after the ignition is turned off
causing the battery to drain; the GPS viewer shows the wrong time.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The parasitic drain can cause the battery to drain, leading to the vehicle not starting.
symptoms: The battery runs down quickly; the vehicle has a parasitic drain.
